contexts.context: ...the game is really open to all, you don't need an <mark>invitation</mark>. And it is a game, the game of bargaining...
...Imperial cult missions. Only members of the higher ranks are <mark>invited</mark> to assist the Oracle, and the challenges require the skill...
...and all the other Houses on the other. Dwemer and Dagoth <mark>invited</mark> Orc and Nord clans as allies, and held northwest Morrowind...
